duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform highly technical and complex tasks to advance basic and/or translational research programs.
Work with experimental platforms specific to the hiring Program.
Review literature and apply advanced knowledge and skills for protocol development.
Assist in grant and other funding applications as necessary.
Interpret and communicate results of basic and/or translational research.

education_certification.credential: PhD or Master's degree and five years of experience in a technical or research lab.
